dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4794 IH: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into a lease for a Vet Center in Mankato, Minnesota.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Finstad introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into a lease for a Vet Center in Mankato, Minnesota.

section.header: Authority of Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into a lease for a Vet Center in Mankato, Minnesota
section.text: Subject to the availability of appropriations for such purpose, the Secretary of Veterans Affairs may obligate or expend not more than $1,400,000 during fiscal years 2025 through 2026 to enter into a lease for a Vet Center (as defined in section 1712A of title 38, United States Code) in Mankato, Minnesota.
